consequencesForLow.description: Platelet count 100-200 x10^9/L was associated with future cancer, adjusted HR = 1.28(95% CI 1.05-1.57).

consequencesForHigh.consequence: Increased risk for all cause mortality and cardiovascular disease
consequencesForHigh.description: Platelet count 301-450 x10^9/L was associated with mortality, adjusted hazard ratio (HR) =1.42(95% CI 1.06-1.90) and cardiovascular disease, adjusted HR=1.32 (95% CI 1.03-1.69).
